ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.ORGANISATION: Oslo municipality, c/o the Agency for Water and Sewage

DEL.MIXED: Kontrakten kan blive genstand for en fornyet offentliggørelse

CONTENTS.P: Yderligere supplerende oplysninger

The call for tenders is cancelled due to changes in the scope of the works. The tender contest included a contract for rock and concrete works. However, it has recently been decided that rock works shall be transferred from contract E01 to contract E08; Preparatory works. These works represent a considerable scope of works.

The Agency for Water and Sewage need for changes is not only considered as a "justifiable reason" for cancelling the contract, the changes are also considerable. This means that the contracting authority has a duty to cancel the tender contest. Cf. FOSA §§ 11-15 og 13-1 (1) smh., e.g. KOFA 2011/242.

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.ORGANISATION: Oslo municipality, c/o the Agency for Water and Sewage
